invocations.description: Returns true if the key key is pressed on your keyboard, false. A list of keys and their virtual keys can be found here
invocations.ex:
auto(200)
if iskeypressed(0x14) then
	printerror('WARNING! Caps-Lock is pressed.')
end
invocations.exDescription: Will print a warning on the console if the Caps-Lock key is pressed.
